reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Accelerating Towards Epidemic Control II

description.narrative: Zambia - TB/HIV - Churches Health Association of Zambia - CHAZ. This program has the following goals: Achieving zero new infections, zero HIV and AIDS related mortality and morbidity and zero discrimination. Avert 80,000 new infections by 2020. Avert 43,000 AIDS related deaths by 2020. To reduce the number of TB deaths in the population by 40% in 2021 compared to 2015. The objectives of this program are: 90% of PLHIV know their HIV status. 90% of people diagnosed with HIV enrolled on ART. 90% of PLHIV receiving ART achieve viral suppression. To reduce stigma and discrimination associated with HIV and AIDS. To improve access and utilisation of HIV and AIDS servcies by population groups most at risk

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for ZMB-C-CHAZ
Percentage of infants born to HIV-positive women receiving a virological test for HIV within 2 months of birth
Percentage of people living with HIV newly enrolled in HIV care started on TB preventive therapy
Number of people who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
Percentage of HIV-positive women who received ART during pregnancy and/or labour and delivery
Number of notified cases of all forms of TB (i.e. bacteriologically confirmed + clinically diagnosed), new and relapse cases
Percentage of HIV-exposed infants receiving a virological test for HIV within 2 months of birth
Percentage of HIV-positive pregnant women who received antiretrovirals to reduce the risk of mother-to-child transmission
Percentage of registered new and relapse TB patients with documented HIV status
Percentage of pregnant women who know their HIV status
Percentage of adolescent girls and young women reached with HIV prevention programs- defined package of services
Number of medical male circumcisions performed according to national standards
YP-Other-2: Percentage of adolescents (girls and boys) and young women and men reached with HIV prevention programs-defined package of services
Percentage of young people aged 10-24 years attending school reached by compehensive sexuality education and/or life skills-based HIV education in schools
Percentage of HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients on ART during TB treatment
Number of adolescent girls and young women who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
Number of notified TB cases (all forms) contributed by non-national TB program providers – community referrals
Percentage of people on ART among all people living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
Percentage of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of adolescent girls and young women (AGYW) reached with HIV prevention programs- defined package of services
Percentage of TB patients who had an HIV test result recorded in the TB register
Percentage of young people aged 10–24 years reached by comprehensive sexuality education and/or life skills–based HIV education out of schools

Percentage of laboratories showing adequate performance in external quality assurance for smear microscopy among the total number of laboratories that undertake smear microscopy during the reporting period
YP-other 1: Number of girls reached with sponsorship for school fees and stipend to meet their basic needs
Percentage of HIV-positive results among the total HIV tests performed during the reporting period
Number of women and men aged 15+ who received an HIV test and know their results
Percentage of HIV-positive registered TB patients given anti-retroviral therapy during TB treatment
Percentage of young people aged 10–24 years reached by life skills–based HIV education in schools
Impact indicator for ZMB-C-CHAZ
TB mortality rate per 100,000 population
Number of new HIV infections per 1000 uninfected population
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
HIV incidence among 15-49 age group
Estimated percentage of children newly infected with HIV from mother-to-child transmission among women living with HIV delivering in the past 12 months
TB incidence rate per 100,000 population
TB prevalence rate per 100,000 population
TB/HIV mortality rate per 100,000 population
Percentage of young people aged 15–24 who are living with HIV
Outcome indicator for ZMB-C-CHAZ
Percentage of people living with HIV who know their HIV status at the end of the reporting period
Treatment success rate of RR TB and/or MDR-TB: Percentage of cases with RR and/or MDR-TB successfully treated
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Treatment success rate of all forms of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, new and relapse cases

TB treatment coverage: Percentage of new and relapse cases that were notified and treated among the estimated number of incident TB cases in the same year (all form of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed)
Percentage of females aged 15-24 who dropped out of school in the last year
TB O-other 1: Percentage of adolescent school girls who dropped out of school due to marriage
HIV O-Other 1 Percentage of adolescent school girls who dropped out of school due to pregnancy and/or early marriage
Case notification rate of all forms of TB per 100,000 population - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, new and relapse cases
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
Treatment success rate - bacteriologically confirmed TB cases
TB O-other 2: Percentage of adolescent school girls who dropped of school due to pregnancy
